Encounter_One: ^Where is the old woman?! Sir TERR-33 Arium, Sanctified Defender of These Realms requires her aid once again! I can't be seen going into battle with this much oxidation on my chassis.
^Ah, Gran...she isn't with us...But I'm taking over for her starting today.
^Impossible! The old witch never misses a day! If her shop was open when the Battle of Newich came through THIS FIELD, surely she must be willing to take an appointment.
^Please. Point me to your employer, youngling.
^Sir. I am my employer. My grandmother has recently passed. I'll prepare your order right away.
^[A long, awkward silence hangs in the air.]

c-0: ^You work with your grandmother's diligence, youngling. I can see it in your hands...Well...I'll be off now. Fare thee well!
c-1: ^I admire your intent, youngling, but I'd prefer something to handle this unsightly rust.

Encounter_Two: ^Ah! Sir Arium, you have GOT to work on your intro.
^Thank you. What can I get for you today?
^Well, shopkeep. I've returned to extend an apology. The way that I spoke was not very...chivalrous of me.
^Oh...you didn't have to--I mean, it wasn't that big a deal!
^Oh pish-posh! This is the former dwellings of a legend, youngling. Surely you must know about your grandmother's accomplishments.

^I...didn't know her too well, actually. I just remember her giving me treats as a child and journeying on for months, even years at a time. I didn't even know she'd remember me until I saw her will. You're a knight, and you seem to look up to her. Was she your superior?

^Superior? Hilarious. She wouldn't touch the military with a 10-foot lance! She was, however, a guiding beacon for any beleagured soldier, offering healing salves and meals for the wounded. All sides of the Highlands Mechanized Conflicts would gather at this shop and enjoy a noodle dish prepared with the most aromatic motor oil broth. My taste sensors warm at the mere memory of the flavor.

c-0: ^By the Highlands, you've done it! Your grandmother would be so proud...I don't know what the outcome of this next battle will be, but I will go forth with with my emotional sensors set to "warm".
c-1: ^I appreciate this gift, youngling. Would you happen to have the ingredients to this noodle soup on hand?
